topics.title: Путешествия
topics.intro: Let's talk about travelling. What places inspire you?
hints: You can mention countries, hotels or types of transport.
Try to use past tense to describe your latest trip.

responses.answer: Flying can be both exciting and exhausting. Do you like long flights?
Choosing the right hotel makes any journey better. What do you usually look for?
There are so many beautiful places to explore. Which city is on your wish list?
A day at the beach sounds relaxing! Do you prefer swimming or sunbathing?

topics.fallback: Travelling teaches us a lot. Tell me what kind of adventure you enjoy.
topics.closing: Thanks for the chat about travelling!

topics.title: Еда
topics.intro: Food brings people together. What tastes do you enjoy?
hints: Talk about your favourite dishes or the way you cook them.
Use adjectives such as sweet, spicy or fresh.

responses.answer: Cooking at home lets you experiment with flavours. What's your signature dish?
Eating out can be a small celebration. Do you have a favourite restaurant?
I have a sweet tooth too! What's the best dessert you've ever tried?
Spicy food wakes you up instantly. How hot do you like your dishes?

topics.fallback: Food memories are the best. Tell me more about flavours you love.
topics.closing: It was delicious to talk with you!

topics.title: Повседневная жизнь
topics.intro: Let's practice daily small talk in English.
hints: Mention your hobbies, work or how your day is going.
Use phrases like 'I'm interested in...' or 'I usually...'.

responses.answer: Work can be challenging. What helps you stay productive?
Learning something new keeps the mind sharp. What are you studying now?
Free time is precious. How do you spend your weekends?
Spending time with loved ones gives us energy. What do you do together?

topics.fallback: Tell me more about your routine. I'm here to listen!
topics.closing: Let's continue our small talk next time!
